name: No slight in fight
description:
"You are 2 heroes who came to free the kidnapped girl Sakara, a representative of a noble family. On your way there will be crowds of the undead, many mysteries and a sea of blood!"


* The game was made for Curdle Jam #24

* The version is very unstable and needs work!

* If the browser version does not work, try downloading the archive.

* There are also a lot of bugs and unfinished things in the game, because game was made in 9 days.



WASD - moving
Hold LMB to attack
E - activate
L - Load/restart 
Esc - open menu
